author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Lake Oswego is interested in seeing City Council Goals from other cities.  In particular, we would like to review and learn from goals or priority/vision statements that helped guide a Council’s discussion throughout the year.  
Please forward whatever information, documentation, etc., that you can send to the undersigned.
Jordan D. Wheeler
Assistant to the City Manager
City of Lake Oswego, OR
 (503) 697-7414
jwheeler@ci.oswego.or.us
title: Council Goals
